uniroma1.sbn.finalproject.avellinotrappolini.italianreferendum2016.Manager

Class IndexManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniroma1.sbn.finalproject.avellinotrappolini.italianreferendum2016.Manager.IndexManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PoliticiansIndexManager, SupportersIndexManager, TweetsIndexManager

    public abstract class IndexManager
extends Object
    Abstract class that collect all the methods and attributes that an IndexManager needs to have and extends.
    Author:
    Gabriele Avellino, Giovanni Trappolini

      • create

        public abstract void create(String sourcePath)
        Create a new index using data stored in sourcePath.
        Parameters:
        sourcePath - Relative path to the physical location were are stored data need for index generation

      • create

        public abstract void create(String sourcePath,
                            String fieldName,
                            ArrayList<String> fieldValues)
        Create a new index using data stored in an other. In particoular data of a specific field that match specific values.
        Parameters:
        sourcePath - Relative path to the other index physical location
        fieldName - field name of source index needed for the creation of the new one
        fieldValues - values to match in the field in order to get right data
